28.heading: Colombia.
28.title: "Fantastic Facts"
28.author: Geo
notes: Illustrated facts about J.H. Hedley, who fell from an airplane in World War I, and landed safely on the tail of the same plane ; about the Rio Vinagre (Sour River) in Colombia ; Chinese etiquette, the grebe, and African languages.

29.heading: Colombia.
29.title: Fotonovelas : Message Creation and Reception
29.author: Cornelia Butler Flora.
notes: Photocopy from: Journal of Popular Culture, v. 14, no. 3 (Wunter 1980), p. 524-534.
Includes bibliographical references.
SUMMARY: Describes the mechanics of the production and distribution of fotonovelas in Colombia, and comments on their popularity. 1. Fotonovelas
Publication and distribution. 2. Colombia
Popular culture. 3. Fotonovela industry
Colombia. I. Flora, Cornelia Butler, 1943- II. Journal of Popular Culture. III. Message Creation and Reception. Call no.: PN6790.C6F55 1980
